item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, August 29, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Nvidia shares fall even as revenue more than doubles
2. ‘Obscenely greedy’ oil executives handed Swiss jail terms for role in 1MDB fraud
3. Wealthy households and businesses brace for tax rises after Starmer speech
4. How Telegram chief Pavel Durov miscalculated on moderation
5. Which taxes can the UK government raise in the Autumn Budget?
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, August 29, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
